input_args.passage: 'Mark E. Mitchell | Military Wiki - Fandom | Mark E. Mitchell was the first member of the United States Army to be awarded the Distinguished Service Cross during the War in Afghanistan (2001-present), ...'
input_args.claim: 'This is confirmed by source, which states that he was the first member of the United States Army to be awarded the Distinguished Service Cross during the War in Afghanistan, which the Battle of Qala-i-Jangi was a part of.'
